column5: This MSc in Engineering Design will equip you with skills and knowledge you’ll need to deliver engineering projects efficiently. You’ll gain an advanced critical understanding of theoretical concepts to help you solve problems in existing and emerging technologies.Bringing together both the practical and creative aspects of design You'll learn about how creative techniques, analytical skills and engineering principles are used to solve design
column7: Questions about fees?  Contact our Enquiries Team:  0330 123 2023  advice@bnu.ac.uk
